entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:42 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 8:57 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

Temperature: -40.6°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa

Humidity: 61 %

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:20 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:20 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
